name: symfony/panther
description: A browser testing and web scraping library for PHP and Symfony.

update-drivers: vendor/bin/bdi driver:chromedriver chromedriver-bin --os=macos && mv chromedriver-bin/chromedriver chromedriver-bin/chromedriver_mac64
vendor/bin/bdi driver:chromedriver chromedriver-bin --os=linux && mv chromedriver-bin/chromedriver chromedriver-bin/chromedriver_linux64
vendor/bin/bdi driver:geckodriver geckodriver-bin --os=macos && mv geckodriver-bin/geckodriver geckodriver-bin/geckodriver_mac64
vendor/bin/bdi driver:geckodriver geckodriver-bin --os=linux && mv geckodriver-bin/geckodriver geckodriver-bin/geckodriver_linux64

suggest.dbrekelmans/bdi: Installs compatible drivers for your browsers.
